item.title: Resident Evil Reboot In Development With Acclaimed Horror Director, & This Update Fuels Bidding War Between Four Studios
item.description: The horror director tapped to helm the latest Resident Evil reboot has sparked a bidding war between studios looking to land the video game movie.

item.title: Chris Pratt & Rebecca Ferguson's New Sci-Thriller Gets Release Delay
item.description: The new sci-fi thriller starring Guardians of the Galaxy's Chris Pratt and Dune's Rebecca Ferguson is pushed back from its Summer 2025 release date.

item.title: This Donnie Yen Superhero Film Is A Must-Watch Sequel To One Of Jet Li's Best Martial Arts Movies
item.description: One of Jet Li's best martial arts movies received a surprising sequel in the form of a Donnie Yen superhero movie, released 16 years later.
